name: Raking Wings
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Razor sharp wings of wind slice through target creature within range you can see. Make a magic attack roll. On a hit, the creature takes 5d6 slashing damage, plus your spellcasting stat. Creatures that are flying immediately fall 50 feet.

This spell has an increased critical hit threshold. Without any other modifiers, it scores a critical hit on a roll of 17 or better.
empower: Creatures hit by this spell lose their flying speed until the end of your next turn.
